And if you have been paying attention, you will hear that our Monday episodes come with highlights, the full article as well as the keyword drills at the end. So what is the point of the highlights?

chunks.chunk_text: To start off by giving you a general idea of the article of the main highlights.From the main highlights, you want to build context as you are listening to the highlights.From the context that you have built, it's easier for you when you do reading out loud exercises or shadowing exercises with me.Once you have built a general idea of the topic, then we can go on to reading the article together or you can shadow the article along with me.

chunks.chunk_text: always come back to practice the speaking side, which is ultra important today.The output is most important in the use of English.The point is not to just sit and listen, but you want to be focusing on your output.So on the speaking side, you can use this article and read it out loud for yourself or you can shadowing it along with me.So you build muscle memory and comfort in this full English environment.If you find this useful,
